_comment._col_to_load: columns important to the target, keep blank for loading all features
_comment._train_val_eval: train val and evaluation split ratio
_comment._drop_strategy: dropping strategy, 1 indicate axis 1(column), if set to 0 it will drop rows where it contain NaN value
_comment._col_to_dummied: feature that will be dummied, leave empty to dummy all feature
_comment._processed_data_PATH: path to dump the prosessed data
